column5: The walleye bite is still decent. It was great until the water levels dropped and the water became muddy. The walleye are deeper right now on current breaks and eddies.Pike are biting like crazy, some of the biggest I've seen here in years (which aren't huge, but 30-35" are good fun)And the smallmouth bite is going off right now, good size almost everywhere you can throw a bait.
